dmca.title: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.uk-internetlimited.com
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 11, 2005 10:20 AM
To: babbey@escrow.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.uk-internetlimited.com

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1



Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Brandon Abbey <babbey@escrow.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>, <legal@theplanet.com>
Date: Thursday, February 10, 2005, 7:19:20 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.uk-internetlimited.com

===8<==============Original message text===============
It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.uk-internetlimited.com



This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Escrow.com and its affiliated licensed escrow services provider,
Internet Escrow Services ("IES").  It has been brought to our attention
that your company provides services to a website,
www.uk-internetlimited.com <http://www.uk-internetlimited.com/>   which
is infringing on Escrow.com's intellectual property rights to the
material posted on Escrow.com (www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/>
).  They have taken content from our site.



Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.uk-internetlimited.com <http://www.uk-internetlimited.com/>   site,
http://www.uk-internetlimited.com/process.php?SID=b6fe937fcb8549cf2ccb4a
13f8efc590  Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with
www.uk-internetlimited.com <http://www.uk-internetlimited.com/>   and
has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the
law.



The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty
of perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.











Brandon W. Abbey

Managing Director

Escrow.com

16275 Laguna Canyon Road

Irvine, CA  92618

Direct - 949-790-5880

Fax - 949-790-5811




===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCDNsdvK/XpJs6oyURAiP+AJ9lXbhP3l3RuRyplTzLsdnS2/hbdACgiOX2
xQ87kXKduoEDx8Vrk5rX4bU=
=nSG3
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
